comment: Censorship is fundamentally dumb and yields no long term benefit, because it's impossible to control another person's thoughts and feelings. You must provide info. Even if you censor someone, you haven't changed their mind. Thus, censorship is useless. You must change people's minds with facts and arguements, not abuse your power and use violence.
amr:
# ::snt Censorship is fundamentally dumb and yields no long term benefit, because it's impossible to control another person's thoughts and feelings. You must provide info. Even if you censor someone, you haven't changed their mind. Thus, censorship is useless. You must change people's minds with facts and arguements, not abuse your power and use violence.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / dumb
                  :domain (c / censure-01)
                  :manner (f / fundamental))
            :op2 (y / yield-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
                        :ARG1-of (l / long-03))
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (p / possible-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (c3 / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (t / think-01
                                                :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                      :mod (a3 / another)))
                                          :op2 (f2 / feel-01
                                                :ARG0 p2)))))))
      :snt2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)
            :ARG2 (p3 / provide-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (ii / information)))
      :snt3 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (c4 / change-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / mind-05
                        :ARG0 (s / someone)))
            :ARG2 (e / even-if
                  :op1 (c5 / censor-01
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG1 s)))
      :snt4 c2
      :ARG1 (u / useless
            :domain (c6 / censor-01))
      :snt5 (o2 / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (y4 / you)
            :ARG2 (c7 / change-01
                  :ARG0 y4
                  :ARG1 (m3 / mind-05
                        :ARG0 (p4 / person))
                  :ARG2 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (f3 / fact)
                        :op2 (a5 / argue-01))
                  :ARG1-of (ii2 / instead-of-91
                        :ARG2 (a6 / abuse-02
                              :ARG0 y4
                              :ARG1 (p5 / power
                                    :poss y4))
                        :op3 (u2 / use-01
                              :ARG0 y4
                              :ARG1 (v / violence))))))
